text: @Yamiche I get so pissed when politicians say that crap. People want to work. People want to have a wage that will support their families and are happy for the unemployment. The joke is even that doesn’t cover it. They aren’t rushing back because of COVID19. We have idiot “leaders.”

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
